name: Treasure Hunt 2D
description:
My first 2D game in Unity! This was developed for the course COMP 376 at Concordia University.

Collect the gold on the ocean floor and bring it back to your boat! Avoid the sharks and don't get too greedy as the more you collect the more heavy you become! Oh and watch out for that Octopus!

Controls:

WASD - Move/Swim

Spacebar - Use star powerup (you'll have to be quick to catch it when it spawns!)
